select * from t_pl_medicalwastes
or medicalWastesId like binary"%"#{keyword}"%" or dateTime like binary"%"#{keyword}"%"
and DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')

order by dateTime desc
limit #{page.start}, #{page.count}
